script.docDescription: Path of the script to launch, required field

name.docDefault: Script filename without the extension (app for app.js)
name.docDescription: Process name in the process list

cwd.docDefault: CWD of the current environment (from your shell)
cwd.docDescription: Current working directory to start the process with

args.docDescription: Arguments to pass to the script

node_args.docDescription: Arguments to pass to the interpreter

out_file.docDescription: File path for stdout (each line is appended to this file)

error_file.docDescription: File path for stderr (each line is appended to this file)

log_file.docDescription: File path for combined stdout and stderr (each line is appended to this file)

log_type.docDescription: Define a specific log output type, possible value: json

log_date_format.docDescription: Format for log timestamps in day.js format (eg YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm Z)

env.docDescription: Specify environment variables to be injected

^env_\\S*$.docDescription: Specify environment variables to be injected when using --env <env_name>

max_memory_restart.desc: it should be a NUMBER - byte, "[NUMBER]G"(Gigabyte), "[NUMBER]M"(Megabyte) or "[NUMBER]K"(Kilobyte)
max_memory_restart.docDescription: Restart the app if an amount of memory is exceeded (format: /[0-9](K|M|G)?/ K for KB, 'M' for MB, 'G' for GB, default to B)

pid_file.docDescription: File path where the pid of the started process is written by pm2

restart_delay.docDescription: Time in ms to wait before restarting a crashing app

exp_backoff_restart_delay.docDescription: Restart Time in ms to wait before restarting a crashing app

source_map_support.docDescription: Enable or disable the source map support

disable_source_map_support.docDescription: Enable or disable the source map support

wait_ready.docDescription: Make the process wait for a process.send('ready')

instances.docDescription: Number of instances to be started in cluster mode

kill_timeout.docDescription: Time in ms before sending the final SIGKILL signal after SIGINT

shutdown_with_message.docDescription: Shutdown an application with process.send('shutdown') instead of process.kill(pid, SIGINT)

listen_timeout.docDescription: Time in ms before forcing a reload if app is still not listening/has still note sent ready

cron_restart.docDescription: A cron pattern to restart your app

merge_logs.docDescription: In cluster mode, merge each type of logs into a single file (instead of having one for each cluster)

vizion.docDescription: Enable or disable the versioning metadatas (vizion library)

autostart.docDescription: Enable or disable auto start when adding process

autorestart.docDescription: Enable or disable auto restart after process failure

stop_exit_codes.docDescription: List of exit codes that should allow the process to stop (skip autorestart).

watch_delay.docDescription: Restart delay on file change detected

watch.docDescription: Enable or disable the watch mode

watch_options.docDescription: Object that will be used as an options with chokidar (refer to chokidar documentation)

min_uptime.desc: it should be a NUMBER - milliseconds, "[NUMBER]h"(hours), "[NUMBER]m"(minutes) or "[NUMBER]s"(seconds)
min_uptime.docDescription: Minimum uptime of the app to be considered started (format is /[0-9]+(h|m|s)?/, for hours, minutes, seconds, docDefault to ms)

max_restarts.docDescription: Number of times a script is restarted when it exits in less than min_uptime

exec_mode.docDescription: Set the execution mode, possible values: fork|cluster

force.docDescription: Start a script even if it is already running (only the script path is considered)

append_env_to_name.docDescription: Append the environment name to the app name

post_update.docDescription: List of commands executed after a pull/upgrade operation performed from Keymetrics dashboard

trace.docDescription: Enable or disable the transaction tracing

disable_trace.docDescription: Enable or disable the transaction tracing

increment_var.docDescription: Specify the name of an environment variable to inject which increments for each cluster

treekill.docDescription: Only kill the main process, not detached children

port.docDescription: Shortcut to inject a PORT environment variable

username.docDescription: Current user that started the process

windowsHide.docDescription: Enable or disable the Windows popup when starting an app
